Disease.content:

Paragraph: Isoproterenol ( 100mg / kg ) was injected subcutaneously on the 13th and 14th days to induce acute myocardial infarction .

2. Acute myocardial infarction: This is the disease entity being referred to in the paragraph. It is also known as a heart attack.

Paragraph: Isoproterenol ( 100mg / kg ) was injected subcutaneously on the 13th and 14th days to induce acute myocardial infarction .
